## ðŸŽ¬ BONUS: The Manifesto Test

*A great name inspires a great manifesto. Let's test:*

### OMNISCIENT Manifesto
> *"They built models with billions of parameters. We built OMNISCIENT with three good ideas. They need data centers. We need a laptop. They predict the next token. We predict the next file you'll need. Welcome to the efficiency revolution. Welcome to OMNISCIENT."*

### ATOM Manifesto  
> *"GPT-4 is 1.7 trillion parameters of 'probably this word.' ATOM is 50KB of 'definitely this document.' They went wide. We went deep. They approximate everything. We nail three things. In the land of giants, the atom splits worlds."*

### SPARK Manifesto
> *"Every wildfire starts with a spark. Every revolution starts with one good idea. SPARK doesn't try to be everything. It tries to be the thing you actually needed. Small. Fast. Annoyingly effective."*
